column5: Does anyone know where I can purchase an Ontario Non-Canadian Fishing License in Manitoba? I plan on driving through Minnesota to North Dakota, around Winnipeg, north to Bissett , Manitoba. From there I will head east into Ontario.

The only place in Manitoba that regularly carries Ontario Angling Licences is Woody's Service in Lac du Bonnet. Because of the lateness of the season, you may want to call ahead to make sure that they have what you need. Their number is 204-345-8606. Carl WallManitoba Conservation
Thank you very much for the information. I'll give them a call.
There was to be on-line ordering soon. I don't know if it is available yet. Check http://www.mnr.gov.on.ca
